thread.title: Watch An Interview With A 15-Year-Old Chance The Rapper
thread.title_full: Watch An Interview With A 15-Year-Old Chance The Rapper

author: Danny Schwartz
title: Watch An Interview With A 15-Year-Old Chance The Rapper
text:
Home > Music > Watch An Interview With A 15-Year-Old Chance The Rapper Watch An Interview With A 15-Year-Old Chance The Rapper 1 0 Posted by Danny Schwartz , Feb 16, 2017 at 04:58pm A portrait of Chance as a young man. 
Chicago's YouMedia has been acknowledged for its role in fostering the city's rich hip hop scene. Chance the Rapper , Mick Jenkins , Vic Mensa, and other Chicago artists who are now well-known across the country used to flock to the arts center for a weekly open mic. Earlier this week, the YouTube account GOAT Videos uploaded an interview with a 15-year-old Chance that was filmed at YouMedia. 
Young Chance speaks with his friend J-Emcee about a song he wrote called "Beddy Bye." 
“I’ver known Justin since I was 8 years old,” he said. “My dad was Barack Obama’s campaign manager for a long time and he recently moved to D.C. and I found out that I was moving too, and we wrote ‘Beddy Bye’ a little while ago. It’s definitely real, it was a hard song to write. I think I rewrote it 8 or 9 times.”
